title:
An Exact Formula for Quantum Entropy Production along Quantum
  Trajectories
authors: John E. Gough, Nina H. Amini
abstract:
We give an exact formula for the rate of change of the von Neumann entropy
for the conditional state of a quantum system undergoing continuous
measurement. Here we employ Paycha's Formula \cite{Paycha} which gives the
noncommutative Taylor series development.
